meanings.sent1: I always keep up with the latests in technology.
meanings.sent2: The store just received the latests in fashion trends.
meanings.sent3: My cat thinks the latests in toys are the best to play with.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the latests in sunshine after a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the latests in flowers filled the air with freshness.

meanings.definition: The most up-to-date information or news.
meanings.sent1: The newspaper always provides the latests on current events.
meanings.sent2: I rely on the internet for the latests on weather forecasts.
meanings.sent3: The parrot loves to repeat the latests in gossip it hears.
meanings.sent4: His eyes sparkled with the latests in excitement as he shared the news.
meanings.sent5: The radio broadcasted the latests in music hits for everyone to enjoy.
